channel.title: Learning community on Bodong Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Learning community on Bodong Chen

item.title: Notes: Nistor. (2014). Participation in virtual academic communities of practice
item.description: References Citekey: @Nistor2014 Nistor, N., Baltes, B., Dascălu, M., Mihăilă, D., Smeaton, G., & Trăuşan-Matu, Ş. (2014). Participation in virtual academic communities of practice under the influence of technology acceptance and community factors. A learning analytics application. Computers in Human Behavior, 34, 339–344. doi:10.1016/j.chb.2013.10.051 Notes Not a typical learning analytics research even though ‘learning analytics’ is featured in the title. Highlights 2.2. Educational technology acceptance (p. 340) A prominent acceptance theory is Venkatesh’s Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT; Venkatesh et al.
